item.title: Website Redesign
item.description: I just finished the first version of a complete redesign of this website! This time I completely wrote all of the css from scratch and I set up the hugo site without a specific theme. I have a lot of changes planned but for now I’m really happy with this early version of the site.

I’m Matko, a 27 year old software developer from Austria. I work with C#/.NET professionally at Intact, and for some personal projects I have been using Flutter/Dart, a little bit of Python & Go, and I am currently learning Rust! Some ideas for content that I want to put on this website: a personal blog programming side projects a digital cv - either just hosting a PDF or writing some custom css to format everything nicely a reading list & place to review books I’ve read, basically an online library / bookshelf, maybe a way to replace my Goodreads account a custom bookmarks page for websites and links I commonly use (maybe just one big html table) About this website This website is built using the static site generator hugo.

item.title: Habit Tracker
item.description: A Flutter app which lets the user create personal habits, tasks and events.

item.title: Second Project
item.description: This is a second project as a placeholder for testing the css design.
